languages.text: Decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −25. When the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source, all Drukhari regain 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}強度{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}をそれぞれ−25減少する。ターゲットがどのソースからでも{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、全てのデュカーリは{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を3つ回復する。
languages.original_text: Decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −25.
